messages: I love you so much, I'm glad you moved in with me :)
You're so pretty
I fell in love with you the moment I met you.
I love spending time with you.
I'm so glad I met you, you make me want to better myself.
I love watching movies with you.
My life's been better since I met you.
I love going on little adventures with you.
We make a great team.
Thank you for all the things you do for me.
ILYSMBB
You're precious.
Cutie.
You're always on my mind
Cava?
You're an amazing artist.
You're so special and I feel so lucky to have met you.
I love you more than I love banana flavoured things.
We should go back to point break :)
I love your hair.
"Don't fuck with me Barry, it's not polite" - NoHo Hank
You're my silly goose.
This is redeemable for one free smooch.
Wanna smoke a bowl?
